content: these coasters are a little homage to one of the matriarchs of crafting in our family she was very talented with knitting and cross stitch and all kinds of other crafty pursuits but crochet was always her favourite there were two things she made a lot of baby blankets and these coasters named after her **skill level** beginner **yarn** paintbox yarns simply dk 100% acrylic 302 yd / 276 m / 100 g **alternate yarn** styleraft special dk 100% acrylic 323 yd / 295 m / 100 g premier basic dk 100% acrylic 306 yds / 280 m / 100 g **gauge** not important for this pattern adjust hook size to achieve desired size if necessary **sizes** one size **finished coaster measurements ** 4 5 / 11 5 cm around **yardage / colours** 20 yd / 18 m **hook** 5mm / h **notions** stitch markers tapestry needle measuring tape
